alert.note: Alert for Maries; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:29PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR MARIES AND NORTHERN PHELPS COUNTIES... At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vienna, or 14 miles northwest of Rolla, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belle, Vienna, Brinktown and Vichy. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 200. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
